about_the_game:
Space Academy is a colorful Platformer featuring an inexperienced pilot getting ready to take his journey in the academy to study all the necessary skills.
Play a breathtaking campaign and uncover all the secrets the academy has hidden from recruits.



Go to the Academy filled with many different traps and obstacles.
Platformer in which you will find everything - difficult levels, nice minimalist 3D graphics, unusual characters, dungeons and many more.

Accept the challenge - go through all the levels and pass the one final exam at the academy.
But I forgot to mention that you don't have any superpowers - you're just a newbie pilot in an academy with a strict but experienced leutenant. Good luck




And Experience the endless mode with random generation, which will help you to practice for the final exam in the academy.

Game Features:

  • Many levels filled with dangerous traps and different machines
  • A real challenge for your abilities
  • Nice minimalist graphics
  • Gamepad support
